Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.21 Hetuduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika » 1.21.1 Ajjhattārammaṇapada » 1.21.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika
Ajjhattārammaṇapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
531.
1193Hetu ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo hetussa ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
532.
1194Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1195Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1196Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1197(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup1.21.2 Bahiddhārammaṇapada >>
